titles.title: Neighborhood Economic Development and Opportunity Act of 2020
Neighborhood Economic Development and Opportunity Act of 2020
Neighborhood Economic Development and Opportunity Act of 2020

A bill to establish a pilot program to provide grants to nongovernmental entities, including nonprofit organizations and faith-based organizations, to provide economic support in urban areas of the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
